description:
Flip burgers, chase dreams, and try not to burn the fries—Fast Food Tycoon Simulator puts you behind the counter of your very own fast-food joint. Start with a grill, a dream, and maybe some questionable lettuce, and grow your way into a local legend.

Upgrade your kitchen, fine-tune your menu, and turn every order into a delicious opportunity. Keep your customers fed, your staff on their toes, and your floors free of ketchup spills (well, mostly). Whether you're serving late-night snacks or lunchtime rushes, it's all about speed, flavor, and charm.

Expand your space, decorate like a pro, and build a burger empire one perfectly toasted bun at a time. Just don’t forget to clean the fryer. Nobody likes soggy fries.
